Smart Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush that can connect to your smartphone via Bluetooth. This toothbrush can track your brushing habits and provide real-time feedback on your brushing technique, duration, and pressure. It can also use AI to detect any areas of your mouth that need extra attention and provide personalized brushing recommendations.

Interactive Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush that can play games or display fun animations while you brush your teeth. This can help make brushing more enjoyable and engaging for kids, and even adults who may need a little motivation to brush their teeth regularly.

Customizable Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush that allows users to customize their brushing experience. This could include different bristle lengths, colors, and shapes, as well as customizable brushing patterns and timers.
Toothbrush with Built-in Flosser: Design a toothbrush that has a built-in waterpik or flosser. This can help simplify your oral hygiene routine and reduce the need for separate flossing tools.

Toothbrush with Anti-Bacterial Technology: Develop a toothbrush that incorporates anti-bacterial technology to help reduce the growth of harmful bacteria in the mouth. This could involve using silver or copper ions, which have natural antibacterial properties, or incorporating other antibacterial compounds into the toothbrush's design.
